author: Breitbart London, Breitbart London
title: ICUs on Rails: France Deploys Hospital Trains to Virus Trouble Spots as Macron Criticised for Slow Response
description: PARIS (AP) - The high-speed train whooshing past historic World War I battle sites and through the chateau-speckled Loire Valley carried a delicate cargo: 20 critically ill COVID-19 patients and the breathing machines helping keep them alive.
content:
PARIS (AP) – The high-speed train whooshing past historic World War I battle sites and through the chateau-speckled Loire Valley carried a delicate cargo: 20 critically ill Covid-19 patients and the breathing machines helping keep them alive.
